2021. Made with Hyde.

2021 SENC conference in Lleida, Spain

03 Sep 2021

I will present a poster at the 2021 Spanish Neuroscience Society conference, with the title “Behavioral mechanisms underlying visually-guided control of steering”, work developed jointly with the labs of Greg deAngelis and Jan Drugowitsch.
